import axios from "axios"; import React from "react"; import useInput from "../hooks/useInput"; const Navbar = () => { const navbarSearch = useInput(); const handleSubmit=(e)=> { e.preventDefault(); const searchFromUser = navbarSearch.value; //format the string to use in URL //example: Jack Reacher -> jack+reacher const searchFormatted = searchFromUser.replace(/\s+/g, '+').toLowerCase(); axios .get(`api/search/${searchFormatted}`) .then(res => res.data) .then(searched => { console.log(searched) }) } return (

); }; export default Navbar;
